thread.title: Weightlifting clubs square-off in friendly competition
thread.title_full: Weightlifting clubs square-off in friendly competition

author: Dave Delgado
title: Weightlifting clubs square-off in friendly competition
text:
Weightlifting clubs square-off in friendly competition - KUAM.com-KUAM News: On Air. Online. On Demand. Member Center: Weightlifting clubs square-off in friendly competition   
The Guam Weightlifting Federation hosted a friendly weightlifting competition on Friday at Synergy Studios in Maite. The "Friday Night Lift-Off" saw athletes from 5 GWF recognized Weightlifting Clubs take part in the fundraising activity. 
Angela Rosario, GWF board secretary told KUAM Sports, "We are here to raise funds for all of our athletes to head off island and to compete and represent Guam in weightlifting. We have 10 females and 15 males competing. We have Crossfit Gof Metgot, Crossfit Hita, Crossfit Chamorri, Crossfit Latte Stone and Crossfit Jumpstart all competing. Each lifter has 3 attempts in 2 lifts. There is the snatch and clean and jerk. Basically this reviving the weightlifting community in Guam, we haven't had in over 10 years. We got together with all the other gyms for some friendly competition and we are looking for athletes to represent Guam in the next Pacific Games as well as trying to compete for the Olympics."
